item.title: Build static website using Hugo and GitHub Actions
item.description: Recently I’m working on build my own tech blog so I did some google search trying to find a “morden” way to build it. (I have been using Wordpress for some blogs and websites before.) The finnal two are Jekyll and Hugo, which are both Static Site generators with a lot of adoptions. After reading some articales about the comparison and the documentation of these two, I decided to try to build my own blog using Hugo and GitHub Actions.
